Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi took three early wickets and finished with two sixes
Babar Azam remained unbeaten to lead Pakistan to a three-wicket win
Gareth Delany and Mark Adair added 44 runs for the 6th wicket
Josh Little scored 22 runs in a cameo
Imad Wasim took 3 wickets in 4 overs
Abbas Afridi scored 17 runs in a happy-go-lucky fashion
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen's first-over wicket ended a streak of 8 matches without a first-over wicket
Pakistan's jitters led to a collapse in the middle overs
The chase was made more difficult than necessary by Ireland's late recovery
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mumtaz praised Shaheen's left-arm swing bowling
This was the 36th match in Group A of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
Imad Wasim's performance in this match might be his last for Pakistan
